sentences.en: All adult dogs are routinely wormed at least every six months.
sentences.cn: 所有的成年狗至少每半年要例行打一次虫。

sentences.en: Any outside criticism is routinely dismissed as interference.
sentences.cn: 任何来自外界的批评通常都被当作干涉而不予理睬。

sentences.en: Children have been routinely immunized against polio since 1958.
sentences.cn: 自从1958年以来,儿童都按照常规接种防治小儿麻痹症的疫苗.

sentences.en: Chimps are too scarce, and too nearly human, to be routinely slaughtered for spare parts.
sentences.cn: 黑猩猩又太少, 也太接近于人类, 不可以作为人器官备用件说杀就杀.

sentences.en: Coccidiostats are routinely used in broiler feeds every day.
sentences.cn: 抗球虫药物每天均用于肉用仔鸡饲料中.

sentences.en: EGS is undoubtedly one of the purest materials routinely available.
sentences.cn: 电子级硅无疑是可常规应用的最纯的材料之一.

sentences.en: He is routinely described as the greatest scientist since Einstein.
sentences.cn: 他通常被认为是继爱因斯坦之后最伟大的科学家。

sentences.en: His ruddy face still routinely creases with mirth.
sentences.cn: 他红润的脸庞仍旧时常笑得堆起褶子。

sentences.en: Judges and politicians routinely looked the other way while people were tortured or killed by police.
sentences.cn: 法官和政客对警察虐待或杀人之事常常装聋作哑。

sentences.en: Mothers routinely lay babies on their backs to sleep.
sentences.cn: 母亲们一般让婴儿平躺着睡。

sentences.en: Old tires, carpet, syringes and even crab shells are routinely pulverized in these machines.
sentences.cn: 人们还用这些机器来粉碎旧轮胎 、 地毯 、 注射器甚至蟹壳.

sentences.en: People, he said, should avoid routinely using drugs either to sleep more or sleep less.
sentences.cn: 他说, 我们应避免经常以药物来延长或缩短睡眠.

sentences.en: The diode is used routinely in many kinds of electronic circuits.
sentences.cn: 二极管早已作为常规器件应用于多种电路中.
这个需求通常难以满足。

sentences.en: This vaccine is already routinely used.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗的使用已经常规化。

sentences.en: We are almost routinely harassed by the police.
sentences.cn: 警方几乎隔三差五地就找我们的麻烦。

words.tran_cn: [计] 程序；日常工作；例行公事

trans.tran_cn: 例行公事地，常规地，惯常地，老一套地
trans.tran_en: if something is routinely done, it is done as a normal part of a process or job
